channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Power HMC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Power HMC

item.title: CVE-2023-38280|2024-09-16T19:13:09.983Z -- ibm -- power%20hmc
item.description: IBM HMC (Hardware Management Console) 10.1.1010.0 and 10.2.1030.0 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges to root access on a restricted shell. IBM X-Force ID: 260740.

item.title: CVE-2021-29707|2024-09-16T19:40:32.893Z -- ibm -- power%20hmc
item.description: IBM HMC (Hardware Management Console) V9.1.910.0 and V9.2.950.0 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges to root access on a restricted shell. IBM X-Force ID: 200879.
